filter_expression: (http.request.uri.path contains ".jpg" or http.request.uri.path contains ".jpeg" or http.request.uri.path contains ".png" or http.request.uri.path contains ".webp")
notes: Configured to ignore origin cache-control and use a fixed 30-day Edge TTL for image extensions.
Goal: improve image performance and enable cf-cache-status HITs on repeat fetches.
